flawed_nl_solution:
Since 40% of his students got below B, 100% - 40% = 60% of Mr. Sanchez's students got B and above.
Thus, 60 x 60/100 = <<60*60/100=63>>63 students got B and above in their final grade.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
